title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - FlyByWire A320 - Calibrating the VelocityOne Flight
description:
In this video we will have a look at how to calibrate the VelocityOne Flight to use it in FlyByWire's A320. The calibration is required to make sure you can put the throttle lever for each individual engine in the correct position which means: idle, CLB, FLX/MCT and Go/Around. In addition to these positions we will have a look at the reverse mode which can be very useful.
